# Common Acronyms in Remote Sensing {.unnumbered}

AOI: Area of Interest

ARVI: [Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index](week3.qmd)

AVHRR: [Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_very-high-resolution_radiometer)

Azimuth:

CART:

DEM: [Digital Elevation Model](https://www.usgs.gov/faqs/what-digital-elevation-model-dem)

DSM: Digital Surface Model

DTM: Digital Terrain Model

EO: Earth Observation

EOS: [Earth Observing System](https://eospso.nasa.gov/content/nasas-earth-observing-system-project-science-office)

ESA: [European Space Agency](https://www.esa.int/)

EVI: [Enhanced Vegetation Index](week3.qmd)

GIS: [Geographic Information System](https://www.usgs.gov/faqs/what-geographic-information-system-gis)

GAUL:

GLCM:

GNDVI: [Green Normalized Difference Vegetation Index](week3.qmd)

GOES: [Geostationary Operational Environmental Satellite](https://science.nasa.gov/mission/goes/)

IFOV: Instantaneous Field of View

LandSat: [Land Satellite](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Landsat_program), L-8, L-9

LiDAR: [Light Detection and Ranging](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lidar)

LULC:

MODIS: Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer

MSAVI: [Modified Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index](week3.qmd)

NDMI: [Normalized Difference Moisture Index.](week3.qmd)

NDVI: [Normalized Difference Vegetation Index](week3.qmd)

NDWI: [Normalized Difference Water Index](week3.qmd)

NOAA: [National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration](https://oceanservice.noaa.gov/about/)

PCA: Principal Component Analysis, a statistical technique used to reduce data dimensionality, prioritising significant features by transforming correlated bands into uncorrelated components.

POI: Point of Interest

RF: Random Forest

ROI: Region of Interest

RS: Remote Sensing

SAVI: [Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index](week3.qmd)

SNAP: Sentinel Application Platform, a software platform used for processing and analyzing satellite data, mostly European Space Agency's Sentinel series Earth Observation data.

SNR: Signal to Noise Ratio

SVM: [Support Vector Machine](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=efR1C6CvhmE)

UAV: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
